div.h2: US Core DocumentReferences Category Code System

div.p: The Us Core DocumentReferences Type Code System is a 'starter set' of categories supported for fetching and storing DocumentReference Resources.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core-r4/CodeSystem/us-core-documentreference-category defines the following codes:

tr.td: Part of a medical record where healthcare professionals record details to document a patient's clinical status or achievements during the course of a hospitalization or over the course of outpatient care ( [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Progress_note))
Indicates that the category is not covered by one of the pre-defined codes.

title.value: US Core DocumentReferences Category Code System
